document_data.caption: A map showing Khaerbaal in southwest Halruaa.
document_data.name: Khaerbaal
document_data.mainbody: '''Khaerbaal''' was a city located in [[Halruaa]] along the [[Great Sea]].
document_data.Description: Located on the southern coast of Halruaa, Khaerbaal was sheltered from pirates and rough ocean currents by the [[Bay of Taertal]].
document_data.History:
This city served as one of two bases for Halruaa's navy, housing 50 ships and 20 [[Halruaan Skyship|skyships]].

Most of the population of Khaerbaal were preoccupied with shipping and trading. The naval base was located on the nearby isle of [[Rulasuu]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
* [[Falling Star Tavern]], a rowdy popular tavern in the city's docks.
* [[School of Augury]], a wizard academy with majestic spires looming over the city.
